Title: I Am Sam

Released: 2001
Length: 02:06:53
Size: 1.31GB
Genre: Drama

Starring: Sean Penn, Michelle Pfeiffer, Laura Dern, Dakota Fanning, Richard Schiff, Loretta Devine and
Dianne Wiest.

Plot: Sam Dawson (Sean Penn) has a problem. A homeless women has just had his baby and then abandons them at a bus stop on the way home from the hospital. But that's only the beginning. Sam is also mentally challenged and has the mind of a 7-year-old himself. He raises his daughter Lucy alone by working at a 
Starbucks coffee until authorities at Lucy's school want to take his daughter away for more suitable foster parents. Now Sam is caught in the middle between his job, his daughter Lucy and a legal battle lead by his lawyer Rita Harrison Williams (Michelle Pfeiffer) and the school that does not believe in 
Sam's capabilities or true intentions.
